name: Pradip K. Das
content: Prof. Pradip K. Das - Personal Website Headlines Pradip K. Das Professor - Dept. of Computer Science & Engineering Head - Centre for Drone Technology Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati Office: H Block, Room No. H-106 Joined Institute: July 1998 Phone: +91 361 2582353 Email: pkdas@iitg.ac.in / hocdt@iitg.ac.in Google Scholar LinkedIn Explore Our Research Frontiers We are actively seeking motivated PhD students to join our team! Speech & Language AI Pioneering work in speech recognition (ASR), synthesis, and analysis. We have a strong focus on low-resource languages and challenging pathological speech. Current Researchers Ms. Ashita Batra (PhD) Deepjyoti Brahma (M.Tech) AI in Medicine Developing computer vision models for automated polyp detection in colonoscopies, analyzing sleep apnea, and building assistive technology. Current Researchers Mr. Himanshu Sharma (PhD) Rahul (M.Tech) Drones & Intelligent Robotics As Head of the Drone Centre, our work includes drone-based organ transport, precision agriculture, and voice-controlled navigation. Current Researchers Ms. Jayanthy V Venkat (PhD) Mr. Sanjoy Das (PhD) Digital Forensics & Security Ensuring digital trust by creating robust systems for image forgery detection, analyzing adversarial attacks, and securing digital media. Key Alumni Dr. Badal Soni (PhD) News & Announcements NEW COLLABORATION Speech Lab Collaborates with Sleep Therapeutics 2025 We are proud to announce a collaboration with Sleep Therapeutics. This partnership will generate a novel Sleep Study clinical dataset comprising Speech, Snoring, EEG, and ECG signals. This initiative will open new doors for young researchers planning to pursue research in the medical domain, specifically in sleep apnea and related disorders. INNOVATION AWARD Innovation Award at RIC 2025 Congratulations to Research Scholar Ms. Ashita Batra for being awarded the Innovation Award at the Research & Innovation Conclave (RIC) 2025. 2025 NEW MEMBER Welcome Dr. Loitongbam Sanayai Meetei The Speech Lab welcomes Dr. Loitongbam Sanayai Meetei, who has joined us as an Institute Post-Doctoral Fellow (IPDF). We look forward to his contributions to our ongoing research projects. Joined 2025 OPPORTUNITY Internship Opportunity: Winters 2025 Applications are now open for Research Internships for Winter 2025. Motivated students with a background in Signal Processing and Machine Learning are encouraged to apply. Apply Now BEST PAPER AWARD Best Paper Award at MIND 2024 Paper: "DDSS: Detecting Different Types of Stuttered Speech of Multiple Speakers Exploiting Various Feature Extraction Techniques" (Ashita Batra and Pradip K. Das). Dec 2024 Centre for Drone Technology Prof. Das has been appointed Head of the new Centre for Drone Technology at IIT Guwahati, focusing on agriculture, healthcare, and autonomous navigation solutions.
